message: I'm offering a unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product for $1000000. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, and I'm eager to make a sale. It's a great chance to get a good deal on a product that might be valuable, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, with no past sales data to assess the quality of your products, I'm not comfortable taking the risk at this time.  I'd like to see some evidence of high-quality products being sold before considering a purchase. Perhaps when you have a few sales under your belt, I'll reconsider.

I appreciate your offer and the refund guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product.
